message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a price of $20,000. It's a great opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that will surely appreciate in value over time.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While the product is interesting, that price is a bit high for me.  Would you consider $12,000?
I understand that $12,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $18,000. This is my best price, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. $18,000 is still a bit more than I was hoping to spend. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $15,000?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $16,500. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had so far.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference and agree on $15,750?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high, Bob. I can do $16,000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think that John might be a better option...
